org.ofbiz.entitygen
Class DefReader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.ofbiz.entitygen.DefReader
public class DefReader
extends java.lang.Object

Title: Entity Generator - Entity Definition Reader

Description: Describes an Entity and acts as the base for all entity description data used in the code templates.

Method Detail

getEntity

public static Entity getEntity(java.lang.String defFileName,
                               java.lang.String ejbName)
Creates an Entity object based on a definition from the specified XML Entity descriptor file.
Parameters:
defFileName - The full path and file name of the XML Entity descriptor file.
ejbName - The ejbName of the Entity definition to use.
Returns:
An Entity object describing the specified entity of the specified descriptor file.

getEjbNamesIterator

public static java.util.Iterator getEjbNamesIterator(java.lang.String defFileName)
Creates a Iterator with the ejbName of each Entity defined in the specified XML Entity Descriptor file.
Parameters:
defFileName - The full path and file name of the XML Entity descriptor file.
Returns:
A Iterator of ejbName Strings

getEjbNames

public static java.util.Collection getEjbNames(java.lang.String defFileName)
Creates a Collection with the ejbName of each Entity defined in the specified XML Entity Descriptor file.
Parameters:
defFileName - The full path and file name of the XML Entity descriptor file.
Returns:
A Collection of ejbName Strings
